oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bruce School

Love 10. Miss Shields 11. Jack Robinson 12. Billie Cummins 13. Wood Burch 14. Leonard Sheppard [Middle Row] 16. Lawrence Foley 17. Terrace Parker 18. Marie Craig 19. Elizabeth Johnson 20. Virginia Moss 21. Dorothy Sibley 22. Jame Sibley 23. Ruby McNeil 24. Dick Mauding 25. Wilson Bardner [Front Row] 26. Gladys Rainey 27. Martha Baiven 28. Valerie Bruce 29. McKellar Seldern 30. Louis Miller 31. Cecil Barber 32. Gertrude Hayden 33. Frances Nelson 34. Richard Ward 35. Gus Fitshugh 36. Charles Phillips {Jane Harvey} {Dorothy Moore}
